definitions.definition: To quote ; to repeat , as a passage from a book, or the words of another.
To mention ; to make mention of .

subdefinitions.definition: To mention by way of explanation .

definitions.definition: To list the source (s) from which one took information, words or literary or verbal context .
To summon officially or authoritatively to appear in court .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To quote ; to repeat , as a passage from a book, or the words of another.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To mention ; to make mention of .
To list the source (s) from which one took information, words or literary or verbal context .
( transitive , law ) To summon officially or authoritatively to appear in court .
